sentences: Bondy was born and raised in Mountain Brook, Alabama where he attended Mountain Brook High School.
The album, released in 2007, marked a shift in musical direction towards a more traditional and minimalist folk sound, with Bondy playing mostly acoustic guitar and harmonica.
Bondy released his third album, Believers, on September 13, 2011.
Bondy released his fourth album, Enderness, on May 10, 2019.
